name: Breaking Gates
storyline: An unknown force threatens the kingdom of Kirian by creating several mysterious portals and crystals with immense magical power.Play with Hako and his friends, a group of young adventurers on a mission exploring all parts of the kingdom. To save everyone, Hako along with his guardian Igro, must fight and destroy all the portals that threaten everyone's peace.
summary: Breaking Gates is a 2D action RPG in a fantastic and animated world. Developed by fans of classic games of the genre, Breaking Gates combines dynamic gameplay creating a new experience as you explore the map. Collect items, create and unlock a vast set of equipment to defeat countless challenging creatures and bosses who await you in this adventure!
